title: Pathianin a Kohhran
lyrics:
Pathianin a Kohhran,
Van Kohhranho angin,
An hmelma tinreng atangin,
Khawngaihin a veng thin.

Lai leh van thianghlimah,
A lungphum a innghat;
Pa Pathian a chhungah a awm,
Hmun tina awm thei kha.

Pa in thianghlimah chuan,
Fak takzet leh tawngtai;
Tu pawh ingaitlawma nghak chu,
Chutah an awm ngei ang.

Pathian lei Kohhranho,
Chawimawiin an awm ang;
Hnam ze tinrengin rawn belin,
A ropui an hria ang.

Kohhranho piangtharte,
Duhsak leh engthawlte,
An nunna a lo harh leh ang,

Vanram zing eng rengah.
